list.title: ImageProcessor
list.description: Handles image processing operations for document conversion. Provides functionality for processing base64 images, optimizing them, and managing image naming conventions.

list.title: ImageProcessor#processBase64Image
list.description: Processes a base64 encoded image, optimizes it, and saves it to the output directory.

list.title: ImageProcessor#reset
list.description: Resets the internal image counter to 0. Useful when starting a new document conversion.

list.title: Logger
list.description: Provides standardized logging functionality with colored output. Uses the chalk library to add colors and styling to console output.

list.title: Logger.error
list.description: Logs an error message in red with optional error stack trace.

list.title: Logger.progress
list.description: Logs a progress message with percentage completion.
